name: Comet Kicker
description:
Kicker's home is in danger! Use the power of your furious feet to kick evil comets into puffs of dust. 

  • Your score will continuously fall, so beat enemies fast to keep your points high
  • Destroying enemies quickly will rack up huge score combos
  • Track your best scores over time and see yourself get better and better at the game

Controls:

  • Move: Arrow keys / left stick / dpad
  • Shoot: X key / X button (Xbox) / Square button (Playstation)
  • Jump: Spacebar / A button (Xbox) / X button (Playstation)

- Made with HomeTeam GameDev -
